I’m encountering the same issue. From what I understand, integrationThreadId refers to the ID of a conversation in an external system. However, in my case, I’m integrating with Telegram, which doesn’t have the concept of threads. Instead, I need a way to tell HubSpot that all messages are being written to a single channel.

Ideally, it would be great if I could use conversationsThreadId (the HubSpot thread ID), which is received on the first post message, and then use it for all subsequent messages when sending to /conversations/v3/custom-channels/{channelId}/messages instead of integrationThreadId.

<@U04B32JHTUZ> could you please help with that?
